https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ZiG7V17RPI2zdIZXWKbXgDLd03.jpg The film follows the long-distance relationship between Baneng (Barbie Forteza) and Iggy (Derrick Monasterio), two childhood friends who grew up in different parts of the world. Almost a Love Story
